channel.title: Beverage – Cloud Chemistry
channel.description: Premium eLiquid Custom Handmade to Order™

item.title: Crystal
item.dc:creator: James
item.content:encoded: For Crystal, we blend together two types of strawberries, add a generous spritz of sweet rum, and top things off with a squeeze of tart lime. Right out of the gate you get the sweetness of the strawberries on the inhale. On the exhale is when the rum and tart lime cut the sweetness and carry the flavor home.

item.title: Nova
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: Piña Colada with a cactus and berry twist.
item.content:encoded: This blend manages to take an ordinary Piña Colada to extraordinary heights, all in a few suave flourishes. Beginning with the requisite Piña Colada essences of coconut, vanilla, pineapple, and rum, the artful infusion of berry and cactus blast Nova into the stratosphere.

item.title: Voltage
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: An energy drink with tangy orange silhouettes.
item.content:encoded: Voltage is a citrus infused sports drink that introduces blood orange as the central figure. This eLiquid is sure to shift your performance into turbo.

item.title: Graviton
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: An exhilirating lemonade defined by that red fish candy.
item.content:encoded: This prestigous recipe starts with a bold and zesty raspberry pink lemonade. Using three seperate lemon profiles, we’re convinced this may very well be the best darn lemon recipe in the business. We then throw in a dash of Swedish Fish for that sweet and smooth raspberry flavor that brings out the kid in all of us.

item.title: Aurora
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: A fragrant mixture of cinnamon, spices, and crisp apples infused with subdued citrus undertones.
item.content:encoded: A mulled apple cider mix of green and red delicous apples infused with cinnamon and clove. To finish, we add a twist of orange zest. On the inhale, you’re greeted with the pleasant scent and flavor of the cinnamon and clove. As you exhale, you will get the fermented apples and tangy orange zest. This blend is a complex, full-bodied experience that is sure to keep your senses preoccupied.

item.title: Virgo
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: A refreshing pink lemonade with notes of cactus and strawberry.
item.content:encoded: Virgo is a freckled pink-lemonade defined by charming tones of ripe strawberry. The blend is topped off with a juicy cactus garnish for a finish that is as delectable as the start.

item.title: Nitrogen
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: Revitalizing grapefruit soda with muted citrus accents.
item.content:encoded: Backed by sweet peach and champagne, the hero of the show is the ruby red grapefruit. This is a luminous blend that is sure to awaken even the most lethargic of palates.

item.title: Osmosis
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: A rejuvenating blend of cucumber and lime with mint accents.
item.content:encoded: Osmosis is an exotic blend of cucumber and lime, with hints of sweet lemon zest and cool mint. This blend is like air conditioning to the lungs on a sultry summer day.

item.title: Anglo Libre
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: It’s 5 o’clock somewhere! With a blend of Whiskey, Caramel, and Cola, this eLiquid will take you there.
item.content:encoded: It’s 5 o’clock somewhere! With a blend of Whiskey, Caramel, and Cola, this eLiquid will take you there.

item.title: Mythical Milk
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: A blend of farm fresh strawberries and creamy milk.
item.content:encoded: For Mythical Milk, we start with a sweet and succulent strawberry puree. We then suavely mix in dollops of fresh, sweetened cream, before finally perfecting the texture with the added dimension of condensed milk. This strawberry-milk concoction will have you wishing you bought a bigger bottle.
